description: This table contains information about the patient contacts' special needs. The records included in this table are Patient Relationships (RLA) records.

columns.name: PAT_RELATIONSHIP_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the patient contact record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: SPECIAL_NEEDS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The special needs category ID for a patient contact.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes
